name: Deep Dive (Effigy13)
description:
Welcome to Deep Dive, an ocean exploration game!

A few days ago the water samples started changing so a research submarine is being sent down to collect samples at deeper depths.

Navigate your sub down to get deeper samples. Avoid the wildlife as they have been increasingly aggressive and will damage your sub. The deeper you go the more samples you will get and the higher your score. But be careful as diving too deeply is dangerous, you don’t know what you will find.
